
                            
                            <p>查了下自己以前办的老卡很多都被默默限额了。通知都没有！ <br>  <br> 现在银行限额不止非G限额。还有其他的。哪个低以哪个为准 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/03/130339mh22uwqy0yjquc9s.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/03/130339mh22uwqy0yjquc9s.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/03/130339jhhxyh7cxumfbxyz.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/03/130339jhhxyh7cxumfbxyz.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/03/130340la6n910rpep96wi5.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/03/130340la6n910rpep96wi5.jpg"> <br>  <br>  <br>  <br>  <br> 	    	     <br> </p>
